body.name: BISSELL Power Steamer Heavy Duty 3-in-1 Steam Mop and Handheld SteamShot for Indoor and Outdoor Use:Garage, Workshop, Auto, Boat, Recreational Vehicles; Windows,Furniture and Decks,Black,2685A
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 23 hrs 5 mins
features: POWERFUL, HIGH TEMPERATURE STEAM to blast away dirt, grime, grease, stains, and mold across a wide variety of indoor and outdoor surfaces. For use in garage and workshop areas; Interior and exterior of auto's, boats, ATV's, and recreational vehicles; windows; outdoor patio furniture and decks; And all sealed hard floor surfaces..Cleaning Path Width : 13". Swivel Head : Yes.Automatic Cord Rewind : No
3-IN-1 HEAVY DUTY MULTI-PURPOSE STEAM CLEANER. The upright steam cleaner transforms into both an extended reach steam cleaner and a handheld steam cleaner.
CHEMICAL-FREE CLEANING. Sanitize with the power of steam, eliminate 99. 9% of germs and bacteria.
VARIABLE STEAM MODES and on-demand trigger allows you to control the intensity and amount of steam being released.
CONVENIENT STORAGE with wall mount for easy and convenient storage.
ON-BOARD ACCESSORY STORAGE carries accessories with you as you clean.
INCLUDES 29 ACCESSORIES to tacking indoor and outdoor tough messes that can be used on both the extended reach steam cleaner and the handheld steam cleaner.
body.description: Powerful, high-temperature steam product to remove dirt, grime, grease stains, and mold across a variety of indoor and outdoor surfaces. 3-in-1 heavy-duty, multi-purpose steam cleaner. Chemical-free.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Heavy Duty, Multi-Purpose Steam Cleaning System Use as a handheld or extended steamer, or as a mop to clean and sanitize* sealed hard surfaces *Using the microfiber pad, as instructed. Results may vary. Tested under controlled laboratory condition. Heavy Duty, Multi-Purpose Steam Cleaning System Use with the handheld steamer, extension wand and cleaning accessory of your choice to clean high, low and hard-to-reach areas. Heavy Duty, Multi-Purpose Steam Cleaning System Use with the handheld steamer and cleaning accessory of your choice to clean a variety of surfaces inside and outside of the home.

Tools For Tough Messes Nylon Bristle Brushes (4) Provides scrubbing power for everyday messes on a variety of surfaces. Brass Bristle Brushes (4) Provides scrubbing power for extra-tough messes on durable surfaces.* *Test in a small, hidden area before use to ensure the surface will not damage. Grout Tools (4) Scrubs messes from grout on indoor and outdoor sealed hard surfaces. Flat Scraper Tool Removes hard, stuck-on messes on work benches, stovetops, ovens, outdoor furniture, and more.

Tools for Versatile Steam Cleaning Angle Concentrator Tool Directs steam into hard to reach nooks and crannies. Flat Surface Tool and Mop Pad Steam clean flat, indoor and outdoor surfaces, like running boards, auto interiors, outdoor patio furniture, decks, and more.* Fabric Steamer and Cloth Refresh upholstered surfaces, including car interiors, car seats, patio cushions, pillows, and more. Window Squeegee Steam clean flat surfaces like the inside and outside of windows, glass and mirrors.

Convenient Cleaning & Simple Storage Floor Mop Tool Naturally clean indoor and outdoor sealed floors with the Steam Mop Foot and washable, microfiber pad. Extension Wand Bring the power of steam to high, low and other hard-to-reach indoor and outdoor areas. On-Board Accessories High-use tools store in a toolbox on the handheld cleaner, so you can easily switch out attachments to fit your cleaning needs. Wall Mount Conveniently stores the cleaner, toolbox and accessories bag when you're done cleaning.

Variable Steam Modes and On-Demand Trigger Select the level of steam intensity and control the amount of steam being released. Powerful High Temperature Steam Heats up to over 200 degrees in 30 seconds to blast away dirt, grime, grease, stains, mold, and more across a wide variety of indoor and outdoor surfaces. Heavy Duty 25 ft. Power Cord Extra long power cord is rated for indoor and outdoor use; maximize cleaning coverage in and around your home. Convenient Storage Keep your PowerSteamer Heavy Duty and accessories on the included wall mount, so it's ready to use when you need it. High-Use Tools Store On Board High-use accessories store conveniently on the cleaner, so switching them out is quick and easy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 16, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Incredible cleaning tool
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this mainly because I needed to clean my grout. I live in an apartment and I could tell that gray/black was not it's original color it was meant to have.I did try cleaning the grout by hand, but it was taking too much time and effort for such a lousy result.And wow, I purchased this, I turned it on, and it blasted the dirt away. Stuck on paint.. gone. Stuck on glue... gone. Stuck on whatever that is.. gone. Stains I could never get out by hand scrubbing for hours.. gone in mere seconds.1. It's expensive, but worth every penny for cleaning my home the way I wished it to be for the longest time.2. A lot of these negative reviews are straight up bologna.. here's why:- the cord is meant to be heavy. It's boiling water and actively making steam in 30 seconds. Would you rather have a thin flimsy cable that can be torn or burnt?- the steamer itself is heavy. Yes, but it has the power required to do the job you bought it for. I would not want to skimp on that for the price of the item. Work those arms!- for the broken window review, you probably used it on thin glass in the middle of winter. Yes, temperature is going to affect that.- for those that thought this product wasn't intuitive enough to figure out: you're lying. The manual is 10 small pages. This isn't a rocket and it has 3 simple buttons.- for those that said that it didn't work, they probably were not applying pressure and just expected the steam to hit it and perform a miracle. I'm sorry, but no, a little elbow grease is required for any cleaning job, with or without a machine.3. The tools DO wear down. That is not ideal. But really that is my only complaint. -- P.S. the grout tool wore down too quickly and I still had stains visible in my grout. Switched out for the thicker bristle one and voila!! Dirt gone. ****but as the manual states, test in a smaller spot first, and it's not recommended for use on fragile/softer surfaces****4. Yes, I've had to make several passes to get the dirt out of the grout. But atleast I had this product to make it easier on me. Plus, I don't think the grout has ever been cleaned prior to me moving in. That's a lot of compounded dirt and grime layering for years.5. There's 3 buttons: low steam, pause, and high steam. Yes, there isn't a "power off" button. Hit pause and unplug it. No power = power off.Overall, I am satisfied and recommend this tool. I love this steam mop. Don't listen to the negative reviews and get this tool if you have tough cleaning jobs to do around your house. It does it all, all in one tool. Versatile, effective, and simple to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Exactly what I wanted! I ordered used from Amazon warehouse and the scratch they described was barely noticeable! All of the pieces and attachments were still in their original packaging! SCORE.This thing works amazing, takes the scrubbing out of deep cleaning my house (which is great because I have wrist problems)!! Yes it is a little heavy as other reviews mentioned but it’s a heavy duty cleaner, well worth the weight in my opinion. They have another indoor only option that is probably lighter, but this one didn’t bother my frail wrists at all compared to the scrubbing I would be doing otherwise 😁

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought this to clean grout and it does a great job, but you will go through the grout cleaning attachments for sure. Would be nice if the bristles were thicker and more durable like on the round brush attachment. That is why I gave it 4 stars due to how fast the attachments wear out (some quicker than others even with regular scrubbing and not overly vigorous). When I read reviews prior to buying this steamer I thought perhaps people were not allowing the steamer to do its job and scrubbing to hard, but even with several passes of steam you still need to scrub so it’s inevitable that you will wear out several attachments. But steam is the only thing that has cleaned my grout! No chemicals have worked. So this has been worth the labor it has taken to get my cream grout looking fabulous again. Also worked in the shower where rust has gotten into the grout. Very happy with the results!! I also used this steamer on my wood floors. So far everything has been great. You can’t go wrong with cleaning with steam as it disinfects without chemicals and looks great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Steam Output, attachments are so-so. Will remove paint
reviews.reviewText: I bought a house that had dogs, smokers, and went a long time without proper cleaning. This ended up a being an invaluable purchase for restoring this property. I've used this for:- Removing Paint from hard surfaces- Removing old tape residue from windows, etc.- Removing old stick-on-shelf liner- Cleaning cooking grease off walls- Cleaning tobacco staining off everything- Cleaning grout of years of grime- Cleaning off soot from fireplace- Cleaning Wood FloorsIt outputs quite a bit of steam, and really does a good job loosening up pretty much anything. It's pretty heavy, so if you're doing a large area, you could get a bit fatigued. I used it to loosen up the tobacco staining on the ceiling, and I got pretty sore. When combined with conventional cleaning methods, I think I could manage to clean just about anything.A word of warning. If you're cleaning painted or veneered surfaces, do not stay in place for too long. It will cause the veneer or paint to lose adhesion or bubble up. There's one spot on my cabinet were I made that mistake, and it will haunt me forever. Not the product's fault though. On the other hand, that means it's really good for removing the same. I used it to easily remove paint from windows, faucets, toilets, tile, etc, as well remove years old masking tape that was never removed (previous owners were not master painters, that's for sure...). I also used it to peel up old stick-on shelf liner, which is normally a huge pain, but was a breeze with the steam/scraper tool.Other than the main mop head, the accessories aren't particularly great. I'd like their engineers/designers to spend a little more time think about how the tool is used and improving the accessories, and making them more durable. Replacements are all available on their website though.The fabric steamer tool, which turns into the flat surface tool with a little attachment, broke pretty easily, and the flat surface tool isn't well designed to hold the pads that come with it. It also doesn't swivel like the main mop head, so it's a lot harder to use. The scrubber tools are flimsy and wear out quickly. I found it was more effective to just blast it with the concentrator nozzle and scrub it separately with my preferred brush (careful not to burn yourself, you can). The concentrator nozzle is nice, but they only have one with a 45 degree elbow. It'd be nice if they included a straight one as well. The little scraper tool is pretty good for peeling up tape.The unit did stop steaming after about 4 months of heavy use. It took about 20 minutes with Bissel's chat support through their website to get a warranty replacement sent, so I'd say that's a pretty good result.

reviews.reviewTitle: A bii heavy but for a good reason
reviews.reviewText: This steamer is heavy duty and versatile. I love the attachments even I have not tried every one of them yet. The only downside is that some users may find it a bit heavy. However, I think it is built to last. I used other steam mops before and they are built cheaply and do not last.

I will never recommend anyone to buy this product as I’ve waited for this product for a month and then had to wait for the converter. After all this, it didn’t work and had to return the product eventually. Such a waste of time.
